title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
​ 1 point is earned for the correct slope

slope= 3−0 0−π/2 =− 6 π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A7B@

1 point is earned for the correct equation

​ y − 3 = − 6 π ( x − 0 )

​ y − 3 = − 6 π ( x − 0 )

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct statement f ′ (π/2)=−3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4128@

1 point is earned for an equation using f ′ (π/2) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E78@ (or using a derivation) and f(π/2) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E6C@

1/2 if equations only

f ′ (x)=−3sinx f ′ (π/2)=−3sin(π/2)=−3 y−0=−3(x−π/2) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@60D3@

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly equating the derivative to the slope

f ′ (x)=−3sinx=− 6 π sinx= 2 π MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4EB9@

1 point is earned for the correct solution in [ 0 , π 2 ]

1/2 if solution only

no credit for "no solution exists"

x = 0.690

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the correct integrand

0/2 if not difference of 2 squares

1/2 if incorrect but of form (acosx) 2 − (bx+c) 2 ;a,b≠0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbiqaaWPecaGGOa GaamyyaiGacogacaGGVbGaai4CaiaadIhacaGGPaWaaWbaaSqabeaa caaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaiikaiaadkgacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaam4yai aacMcadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccaGG7aGaamyyaiaacYcacaWG IbGaeyiyIKRaaGimaaaa@4A4D@

0/3 for shell around y-axis

V=π ∫ 0 π/2 [ ( 3cosx ) 2 − ( − 6 π x+3 ) 2 ] dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@5713@
